table.name: vtiger_flights
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_flights` ( `flightsid` int(19) NOT NULL, `name` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `flightsno` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `type` varchar(255) DEFAULT '', `date_departure` date DEFAULT NULL, `date_arrival` date DEFAULT NULL, `time_departure` time DEFAULT NULL, `time_arrival` time DEFAULT NULL, `transport` varchar(255) DEFAULT '', `tags` varchar(1) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`flightsid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_flightscf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_flightscf` ( `flightsid` int(19) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`flightsid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
